collectible.title: Caduceus Staff
collectible.subtitle: ...or are you just happy to see me?
collectible.text: An advanced piece of medical technology, the Caduceus staff heals its target by immersing them in a biotic stream. Having pioneered the field of nanobiotics, Dr. Ziegler is making constant improvements to her tech. Since she recently upgraded to a more advanced model, she has elected to give this staff to you.
